title: Getting Started
description:
RDVue is an opinionated CLI for generating Vue.js projects. We do so by adopting
a development style guide which enforces strong typing with TypeScript, standardized Component, Layout and Page models,
and a data-layer design promoting unified consumption through Stores and Services.

title: Sitemap
description: A sitemap file is useful for helping Google to better index your website, ensuring that the content you write can be visible in search results.
